summary: Like most other mods, its a mod about a friend of mine. But, in this one, a friend of hers and two random dogs also join her. Now, Navmesh doesn't want to work, so I couldn't add a house to Skyrim to get to the house. You will have to player.placeatme the 4 characters to see them. If someone can tell me how to use Navmesh, thanks greatly.
descriptionHtml:
Like most other mods, its a mod about a friend of mine. But, in this one, a friend of hers and two random dogs also join her. Now, Navmesh doesn't want to work, so I couldn't add a house to Skyrim to get to the house. You will have to player.placeatme the 4 characters to see them. If someone can tell me how to use Navmesh, thanks greatly.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Right now, only Victoria Wiggin is a follower, although the other three were put under follower. I will have to look into it. Victoria Wiggin is a one handed / archer with daedric armor.
<br /><br /><br />Alexandria Wiggin is a mage with spells coming from the Archmage, because it is hell to get spells in Creation Kit.
<br /><br /><br />Shiloh Wiggin and Bec Wiggin are both normal dogs. If someone wants them upgraded, send me a message.
<br /><br /><br />
<br /><br /><br />Like I said with Navmesh, it doesn't want to work. So, I am going to put these four into another house, maybe a player house, maybe a house from a mod.
author: Lord JareeRa3
